course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Civil and Environmental Engineering Final Year Project
course.description: The two-term Final Year Project involves applications of civil and environmental engineering principles to the design, planning, experimental or analytical investigation of current engineering design and research problems. The credit load will be spread over two terms. For CIVL and CIEV students in their final year of study only. May be graded PP.

reviews.author: Terry Leung
reviews.title: FYP in Bamboo Engineering
reviews.comment_content: The main focus of the project is experimental testing of bamboo axial member with bolt connection on steel plate. The aim of experiment is to characterise the yield strength and ductility of the particular type of bamboo connection. Our FYP group is rather big with 5 members, and totally we tested 40 specimens in this year.
reviews.comment_teaching:
As this is a project, it is difficult to comment on this part. But to be honest, I am very disappointed with Ilias's supervision. Normally professor will meet with FYP students at least once a month. For Ilias, our group only meet him twice in the entire year, first time in September (~30 min) and second time in January (~1 hour) when we have a interim presentation to him. Then the third and last time we meet him is in the final presentation..... I am not sure if he is busy on other stuff, maybe doing preparation for getting research funding. But I think a responsible supervisor should do more than that, at least not meeting only two times with his students in the entire year..... One of my disgruntled with Ilias is his attitude toward his UG students. I feel that he is indifferent with what we learn and what we work on, he only value his research and the experiments of his research postgraduate student. And according to the experience of me and my groupmates, Ilias always miss our email (base on my statistics the missing rate is 66%). Personally I don't think Ilias is too busy to reply email, every professor are busy, but instead I believe Ilias just simply didn't take us seriously from the beginning.
For the postgraduate tutor of this project, he shares the same attitude with Ilias (所謂臭罌出臭草), not acting as a tutor but only as a boss who demand us to collect experimental data for him. Except the experimental procedure, I don't think he has teach us anthing useful. The tutor is not a considerate person. Throughout the year, there are several time we have argument with the PG tutor on the workload. We tried to ask Ilias to mediate the conflict, but he has no intention to get involved. I don't mind he shows his support to his PG student, but I am really disappointed that he did nothing to solve the problem.
reviews.comment_grading: Considering the heavy workload of this particular project, I would say the grade is extremely poor. There are 5 people working in this project and majority of us get A- only (average grade of FYP), which do not reflect our effort especially our time spent (waste) in lab. Even though there seems to be a fair system to assess our performance by a panel, their assessment are not independent. The supervisor can made comment in the panel meeting and influence other's decisions. Ilias is not a linient person and his grade is poor than average. Also I don't see any chance to impress other panel members as Ilias and the tutor didn't teach us knowledge that are "useful" and presentable. You can imagine that the experimental procedure won't be interesting.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload of this project is very heavy, far more than other FYP topic after comparing with my friends. The time we spent in the lab is 6 hours per week in average (even when the University switch to online class in spring semester, but it is somehow reasonable as this is an experimental topic), but we still have other work such as literature review, data analysis, design calculation and drawing, and report writing. I think the workload for this project is between 2-3 regular 3 credit course per semester. I have heard how heavy the workload is in CIVL3320 Reinforced Concrete Design after Ilias become the instructor. So you can image what is Ilias's expectation to "normal FYP workload". However, the heavy workload doesn't mean we learn equivalent knowledge from it, because we spent two third of time preparing specimens and doing experiment, which contains very little technical content. We are supposed to learn to become engineer, not technician or woodworking worker. Of course this is a very good deal for Ilias to let his FYP students do the experiements, as he don't have to spent his funding to hire lab technician or research assistant, and his research students can still get the experimental data for their thesis. (Bare in mind that research student have studentship but FYP student get nothing! What a GOOD DEAL, Ilias. I must admit that this man is very good at calculating, and manipulative) The only benefit for me in the experiment is I don't have to go to gym, but still able to train my muscle through cutting and drilling bamboo, moving the bamboo from the warhouse, assembling the bamboo with the heavy steel connector (btw the new connector our group design weights 24kg, so good luck to those who would take up our project :) I would recommend those who want to become a woodworking worker, and don't mind to do unpaid work, this is a perfect topic for you. For those who want to become engineer, choose another topic (probably not Ilias's project).

reviews.author: on9Idiot
reviews.title: GT real 6uo
reviews.comment_content:
呢個E唔係俾我嘅fyp content/ topic，
呢個E係比GT
佢整埋曬d垃圾lecture，根本學唔到嘢
又話自己唔識教language
又話唔會俾任何fyp instructions
又話fyp無format跟，叫我地食自己
因為有所謂“attendance”，所以上左4次
無一次有用，依家個人到左，都無attendance….要答啱佢d email先有
diu啦，諗諗下自己為左佢個0.83/100分既attendance 浪費4hour好L傻
reviews.comment_teaching:
都唔知佢來做乜
係度話教英文，但完全無重點
講野又串串嘴
嫌悶同friend講兩句嘢，佢就即刻講：“can you please stop talking!”
真正要stop talking既係GT本人…
reviews.comment_grading:
GT自稱係改fyp的language 的三大神獸之一
話自己d comment好緊要叫我地醒定d…
Language total 得25%，佢佔1/3
佢d grade有幾舉足輕重，自己計啦
佢：「我俾grade 俾得好lenient嘎，40年俾過一個人滿分，啊肥仔Wong仲走過來問我係咪成日俾滿分」
笑死
reviews.comment_workload:
唔理fyp本身，GT 個session就係Attendance 咯
重點係，佢d attendance就算你人到左魂未到都無得拎
答唔啱佢d問題就bye bye
即係叫人唔洗去姐…
ok，無workload 啦

reviews.author: 準雷
reviews.title: 最緊要跟個好老闆 但有個好煩嘅communication tutor
reviews.comment_content:
Depends你揀嘅topic/supervisor
有啲寫code/用software
有啲就要去lab做野
Supervisor嘅PhD學生會係TA

Fall sem一開始會由TA教學生新嘅知識
等學生知道個project大概係點做
有時要睇幾份research paper
通常1-2個星期會同TA有meeting
1個月左右見supervisor一次
要匯報吓個進度或者遇到嘅問題
Supervisor通常會比啲comment
同埋預期之後要做到邊
之後完sem個時要交1st interim report
要寫到introduction, literature review
(可以base on LANG4033個到繼續)
同埋methodology

Spring sem就繼續做
好可能會做多啲野趕進度
因為4月要交2nd interim report
呢到要有80%進度(up to result)
5月頭要交Final report
5月尾就係presentation
reviews.comment_teaching:
[呢個D係比個communication tutor]

其實supervisor唔會手把手教你做
有問題多數同TA溝通
要自己主動啲去諗個project可以點做
成份report都係自己寫

每個星期有一堂50分鐘嘅tutorial
會有個叫Gershom Tse嘅communication tutor
上堂成日吹水 無咩實際教學
根本無野學到
而且佢好串
態度非常唔友善
建議走堂
1/10分嘅attendance唔值得哂咁多時間拎
不過好在佢mark report比分都算鬆手
大部分人都拎到70-90%分
reviews.comment_grading:
Absolute Grading:
Motivation and Task Management (20%)
Supervisor負責比分
Knowledge Acquisition, Critical Thinking and Analysis (40%)
Supervisor + Second reader負責比分
Communication — Report (25%)
Supervisor(10%) + Second reader(5%) + Communication tutor(10%) 負責比分
(1st interm: 2nd interim: final = 1:1:2)
Communication — Presentation (15%)
Supervisor + Second reader + Chairperson負責比分

90%-100%: A+
80%-90%: A
70%-80%: A-
60%-70%: B+
50%-60%: B
40%-50%: B-
32.5%-40%: C+
25%-32.5%: C
17.5%-25%: C-
<17.5%: D/F

My grade: A
幾好grade! (有groupmate A+)
reviews.comment_workload:
我係group project所以還好
可以幾個人一齊分擔workload
有野搞唔掂就一齊解決
一開頭咩都唔識可能有啲辛苦
不過好彩進度唔錯
所以去到4月中已經做哂所有technical work
有足夠時間埋尾寫report
如果supervisor有提供類似topic嘅paper
就會輕鬆好多
慳好多搵文寫literature review嘅時間
有其他人做做吓先推倒重來
所有野逼哂係last moment先做哂就好辛苦
不過5月撞final exam
要邊溫書邊預備presentation
都有少少chur嘅

終於畢業了
希望我寫嘅CIVL course review
幫到一班師弟/妹
加油 : )
